title: The Windows Subsystem for Linux Is Now Open Source
author: Frederic Lardinois
description: Microsoft today announced that it is open sourcing the Windows Subsystem for Linux, which developers have been requesting for a long time.
cntitle: 适用于 Linux 的 Windows 子系统现已开源
cndescription: 微软今天宣布，它正在开源适用于 Linux 的 Windows 子系统，这是开发人员长期以来一直要求的。
